title: Derailed, Ep. 5: Going Nowhere
description: Before Gov. Scott Walker canceled the high-speed rail line that would have connected Madison to Milwaukee in 2010, Wisconsin bought two trains from a Spanish company named Talgo. The story of these trains is messy. And in a way, they're the physical reminder of the debate Wisconsin had almost a decade ago.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
media:credit: Wisconsin's Talgo trains sit at an Amtrak facility in Indiana
